name: ASUSZenEye
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the ZenEye Skill, now you can arm, disarm and control your ASUS ZenEye by speaking to Alexa enabled devices.
 
To get started, refer to the following steps to link Alexa to your ASUS ZenEye to enable the Alexa skill. 
1. Select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your ASUS account and discover your ZenEye devices. 
2. Once your account is linked and ZenEye devices are discovered, you can ask Echo Show, Fire TV, Echo Spot, Echo Speakers (such as Echo, Echo Plus and Echo Dot) by saying following commands,
- “Alexa, show the backyard”
- “Alexa, hide the Living Room”
- "Alexa, disarm the backyard" 
- "Alexa, arm the backyard"
